text: Yosiwo Palikkun George (July 24, 1941 â€“ August 14, 2022) was the Vice President of the Federated States of Micronesia from 2015 until his death in 2022. He served as Vice President under the presidencies of Peter M. Christian and David W. Panuelo. He served as Lieutenant Governor of Kosrae, Governor of Kosrae. He also was an Ambassador to the United States, Israel and the United Nations. He died from COVID-19 on August 14, 2022 at the age of 81.FSM Vice President Yosiwo P. George dies at age 81 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic Category:Vice presidents Category:Federated States of Micronesia Category:Oceanic politicians Category:Ambassadors to the United States Category:Ambassadors to the United Nations Category:Ambassadors to Israel
title: Yosiwo George
